title: What are you trying to hide?
text: Think about the kind of information that could be useful later but doesn't need to be the focus right now.

title: Must you include it?
text: Consider if the information is necessary for the main body or if it's more supportive in nature.

title: Balancing Detail with Brevity
text: Where can supplemental, yet possibly complex, material be accessed without distracting from your main points?

title: Conclusion
text: In presentations, there should be a space dedicated for additional information that isn't crucial for the primary content but could be valuable if needed later on.
